paper_abstract: We develop a new one-to-one correspondence between a two-dimensional (m x n, k, rho) optical orthogonal code (2-D (m x n, k, rho)-OOC) with AM-OPPTS (at most one-pulse per time slot) property and a certain combinatorial subject, called an n-cyclic holey packing of type m (n) . By this link, an upper bound on the size of a 2-D (m x n, k, rho)-OOC with AM-OPPTS property is derived. Afterwards, we employ combinatorial methods to construct infinitely many 2-D (m x n, k, 1)-OOCs with AM-OPPTS property, whose existence was previously unknown. All these constructions meet the upper bounds with equality and are thus optimal.
paper_title: Combinatorial constructions for optimal 2-D optical orthogonal codes with AM-OPPTS property
